name: sample-llm-observability
description: This repository demonstrates how to implement comprehensive observability for LLM-powered applications using AWS Application Signals and OpenTelemetry.

scripts.cdk:deploy: npm run frontend:build && npm run backend:build && npm -w cdk run cdk deploy -- --all
scripts.cdk:deploy:quick: npm run frontend:build && npm run backend:build && npm -w cdk run cdk deploy -- --all --asset-parallelism --asset-prebuild=false --concurrency 3 --method=direct --require-approval never --force
scripts.cdk:deploy:hotswap: npm run frontend:build && npm run backend:build && npm -w cdk run cdk deploy -- --all --asset-parallelism --asset-prebuild=false --concurrency 3 --method=direct --require-approval never --force --hotswap
